sub_title: Senior Business Controller SCM at Jumbo Supermarkten
summary:
Michiel Geboers holds both a Bachelor’s degree in Business Economics and a Master’s degree in Finance, Chartered Financial Analysts (CFA) – Track, from Tilburg University in Tilburg. After achieving both degrees Michiel studied for 4 month’s abroad in Milan at Università Commerciale Luigi Bocconi. Here he followed additional courses and specialized himself even more in the field of Finance. 

After his study Michiel joined Capitalmind in February 2016, where he worked as an Analyst in the field of Corporate Finance until August 2018.

As of August 2018 Michiel started as a Business Controller at Jumbo Supermarkten, one of the largest supermarket chains in the Netherlands.
